title: Category Listing Business Flow
description: Covers interactions on a category page like Makeup, Skincare etc., including sorting, filtering, and product selection.

steps.user_action: Open a category from the navigation bar (e.g., Makeup)
steps.expected_behavior: Displays a grid of products belonging to the selected category
Loads all visible products with name, price, and image
Navigates to the product detail page

steps.user_action: Sort products by 'Price: Low to High'
steps.expected_behavior: Product list is reordered with lowest price shown first

steps.user_action: Sort products by 'Name: A to Z'
Click on 'Add to Cart' for a product
steps.expected_behavior: Takes the user to the product detail page

steps.user_action: View price tags with 'Sale' (discount) if available
steps.expected_behavior: Discounted products show original and sale price

steps.user_action: Click on pagination or scroll to next page
steps.expected_behavior: Next set of products is loaded
